cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with recommender systems that use user-provided reviews, which is a topic that falls under information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also proposes a novel neural network model that uses attentive modules, which is a common technique in natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also mentions the use of multi-hierarchical paradigms, which is a technique used in deep learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper uses neural networks to learn to extract the most salient contents, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper mentions the use of real datasets, which may involve computer vision techniques (cs.CV) if the datasets include images or videos.
